Package gov.tak.platform.client.dted

Class Dt2FileWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.tak.platform.client.dted.Dt2FileWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, java.lang.Runnable
    public class Dt2FileWatcher
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Disposable
    Used by the DTED outlines overlay to track DTED files on the device

      • getRelativePath

        public static java.lang.String getRelativePath​(int level,
                                               double lat,
                                               double lng)
        Get the file path relative to the "DTED" directory for a given latitude and longitude i.e. getRelativePath(2, 30, -73) = "w073/n30.dt2"
        Parameters:
        level - DTED resolution level
        lat - Latitude in degrees
        lng - Longitude in degrees
        Returns:
        Relative file path

      • getRelativePath

        Parameters:
        file - File
        Returns:
        Path relative to /atak (i.e. "/atak/DTED/w039" -> "DTED/w039")

        Parameters:
